document.forum_title: Specktra cosmetics and makeup forum - Makeup Tutorials
document.discussion_title: The Power Of MakeUp || Scary Dead Girl PRANK || Samara || GONE WRONG
document.topic_text: The Power Of MakeUp || Scary Dead Girl PRANK || Samara || GONE WRONG MUST WATCH IT TO THE END !!! This time completely different video.This is my first ever PRANK. Scary dead girl prank!! It is inspired by movie's character Samara from "The Ring". We had this idea about 5 months and finally I decided to do it and I am obsest!!! Creating something creapy and scary is absolutely sick and amazing in one. With this video, I want to show you the power of MakeUp! As you can see I tried to do this look very very real.So you DO NOT need a lot of makeup YOU HAVE to keep it real as much as possible.AND finally what I want to say - never be afraid of doing something different something out of your comfort zone. Live your life absolutly FREE.And don't forget to be SAFE xD. Sometimes it goes wrong.... Love you. And BIG thanks to those of you who came to take pic with me.It'sooo cool that you were thinking that everything (my look) was real .Amaaaazing!!!!
